content: the crochet cat gnome pdf pattern comes with two variations written into the pattern with the ability to make the cat gnome with either a muzzle or a beard each option absolutely adorable in its own way the design also has the bonus that many of the limbs are added seamlessly into the design while crocheting minimizing some of the need for additional stitching this pattern pairs well with the crochet witch gnome pattern which includes a broom that can also be found here on ravelry so be sure to check her out as well happy crocheting note that the smaller crochet cat gnome seen in the pictures is made from the same pattern using size 10 crochet thread the crochet cat gnome is excellent for gifts halloween decor cat lovers halloween fans imaginative play and more pattern information + your pdf purchase includes written instructions and helpful photographs to aid in construction + the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology + the pattern is formatted to have one featured image at the beginning of the pattern for reference with all other full-sized images at the end for easy optional printing skills needed + the skill level needed is intermediate but ambitious beginners are always encouraged to try + the techniques you will need to know include chain single_crochet slip_stitch increase invisible decrease working in the back bar of the chain working in the back and front loop only working both sides of a chain bobble stitch the invisible join and the adjustable magic ring + some hand embroidery is also used in this project materials needed specifics are noted within the pattern + yarn in your choice of colors about 229-251 yds/209-230 m of worsted/aran + a size e/4 3 5 mm crochet hook + stitch markers + tapestry needle + stuffing + pins + scissors + chopstick to help stuff + pipe cleaner + embroidery floss + embroidery needle + needle pullers optional finished measurements using hook size e/4 3 5 mm the crochet cat gnome measures approximately 10 inches 25 cm tall with the tip of the hat standing straight up thank you thank you for supporting my small business it means the world wishing you a blessed day as you spread kindness and creativity
